title: Marine Laboratory Advances Shallow Water Mapping with RIEGL Bathymetric LiDAR
text:
Plymouth Marine Laboratory has selected RIEGL’s VQ 840 GL Topo Bathymetric LiDAR sensor to support its pioneering research into aquatic...

The post Marine Laboratory Advances Shallow Water Mapping with RIEGL Bathymetric LiDAR appeared first on Unmanned Systems Technology.
